mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DEVELOPER_ID, STATUS, AUDITING_TIME, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into COMPANY (ID, COMPANY_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DEVELOPER_ID, STATUS, AUDITING_TIME, OPERATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into COMPANY
ID,
COMPANY_NAME,
ADDRESS,
PHONE,
DEVELOPER_ID,
STATUS,
AUDITING_TIME,
OPERATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update COMPANY
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUDITING_TIME = #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update COMPANY set COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUDITING_TIME = #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY.ID, COMPANY.COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY.ADDRESS, COMPANY.PHONE, COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID, COMPANY.STATUS, COMPANY.AUDITING_TIME, COMPANY.OPERATE_TIME FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND COMPANY.AUDITING_TIME = (SELECT MAX(COMPANY.AUDITING_TIME) FROM COMPANY WHERE DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID)
